product.name: 21.5 Inch Touchscreen Monitor FHD 1920x1080P, Built-in Speakers, VESA Supports, 10-Points Computer Touch Screen PC Display with Type-B HDMI VGA Port, 75Hz Desktop Touch Display, Black
product.description:
Why there is no touch function after connecting the device?
Please check if you have connected to the Type-B port of the monitor. Then, please check if your device supports touch function, the touch function does not supports on gaming devices, XP system, Linux system and Apple devices.
After connecting the monitor, the screen appears to change color, but no image is displayed
1. Please press the on/off key to restart this monitor.
2. Please try to reconnect the HDMI cable of the monitor.
3. The monitor is malfunctioning, please contact the seller through Amazon
What should I do if the monitor flickers or fails to turn on?
Please check if the monitor's power adapter is faulty, you can try to use a new power adapter to connect this monitor. Secondly, please check if the HDMI cable is faulty.
Does this 21.5 inch touchscreen monitor have built-in speakers?
This 21.5 inch touchscreen monitor with dual built-in speakers
How to adjust the volume and brightness of this 21.5 inch touch monitor?
1. Click the MENU button.
2. Click the UP and DOWN buttons to select.
3. Click the MENU button to enter Options.
4. Click the UP and DOWN buttons to adjust function parameters.
5. Click the AUTO button to exit.
product.bullet_points:
• 【Smooth, Stable And Responsive Touch Monitor】21.5 inch PC touchscreen monitor with 10-point touch function for smooth, accuracy and intuitive touch experience, convenience and efficiency, boost your work productivity. Perfect for office work and daily use. Note: The touch function does not supports on gaming devices, XP system, Linux system and Apple devices. Refresh Rate: 75Hz | Contrast Ratio: 1000:1
• 【FHD 1920x1080P & 99% sRGB】Experience vibrant visuals with the Computer touchscreen Monitor, featuring FHD 1920x1080P resolution. Enjoy crystal-clear images that enhance your productivity. With 99% sRGB color gamut and 16.7M colors of this 21.5 inch touchscreen monitor for rich, vibrant and accuracy color performance.
• 【Dual Built-in Speakers】With dual built-in speakers of the PC touch-screen monitor enhance your viewing experience, delivering rich audio without the need for additional equipment, you can free up desk space by minimizing the connections needed for a more efficient working environment. Brightness: 250 cd/m²
• 【Versatile Connectivity】With Type-B(for touch function), HDMI and VGA ports, the 21.5 inch desktop touch screen display can easily connect to PC, laptop, gaming consoles and other devices. Easily and stable connection, ideal for office use. Note: Please connect the Type-B port via a Type-A to Type-B cable for touch function.
• 【VESA Supports & Eye Protection】With 75x75mm VESA at the back of this 21.5 inch touch screen for flexible installation options and maximize your workspace, save desk space that fits seamlessly into any office environment. Low blue light mode can effectively reduce eye fatigue and enhance viewing comfort. Tilt Adjustable: -5°-15.
